title: End-to-End ML using Python
features: Architected a scalable end‑to‑end ML pipeline in Python, integrating data ingestion, feature engineering, model training, and automated evaluation for production‑ready insights.
Containerized the pipeline with Docker and automated CI/CD via GitHub Actions to ensure reproducibility and rapid deployment.
Tuned hyperparameters and deployed a RESTful inference API, boosting predictive accuracy by 12% over the baseline.
